Get game evolution

getGameEvolution.Rd

Usage

getGameEvolution(game_code, season_code)

Arguments

game_code

The code of the game as obtained from getCompetitionGames().

season_code

The code of the season as obtained from getCompetitionHistory().
Examples are E2023 for Euroleague or U2023 for Eurocup 2023.

Value

Returns a list of two elements for the chosen games and seasons

  • EvolutionSummary. Overall information about minimum and maximum difference of scores between teams

  • Evolution. Minute by minute points of each team

Reference webpage: GraphicStats

Examples

getGameEvolution(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1)
#> $EvolutionSummary
#> # A tibble: 2 × 6
#>   GameCode SeasonCode MinuteMaxA MinuteMaxB ScoreMaxA ScoreMaxB
#>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>      <chr>      <chr>     <chr>    
#> 1        1 E2023      23         0          62 - 37   0 - 0    
#> 2        1 U2023      11         0          38 - 15   0 - 0    
#> 
#> $Evolution
#> # A tibble: 82 × 7
#>    GameCode SeasonCode Minute PointsTeamA PointsTeamB DiffTeamA DiffTeamB
#>       <dbl> <chr>       <int>       <int>       <int>     <int>     <int>
#>  1        1 E2023           0           3           2         1        NA
#>  2        1 E2023           1           6           4         2        NA
#>  3        1 E2023           2          12           6         6        NA
#>  4        1 E2023           3          17           7        10        NA
#>  5        1 E2023           4          19          10         9        NA
#>  6        1 E2023           5          22          14         8        NA
#>  7        1 E2023           6          24          14        10        NA
#>  8        1 E2023           7          26          16        10        NA
#>  9        1 E2023           8          29          16        13        NA
#> 10        1 E2023           9          29          18        11        NA
